You can install the Simple DHCP Server on [Windows], [Linux] and [Mac OS].
Additionally to that, you can install it from [source][1] in many ways.

You can view all [releases][2].

[Linux]: ./linux.md
[Mac OS]: ./macos.md
[1]: ./source.md
